Title: Relates to requiring certain establishments which sell liquor to have devices which measure blood alcohol content
Summary: Requires a retail licensee for on-premises consumption to maintain and make available to customers, at no charge, a device which measures blood alcohol content.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring retail licensees for on-premises consumption to maintain devices which measure blood alcohol content for optional use by patrons
